alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:10PM EDT until August 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 610 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomasville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Thomasville, Lake Park, Lakeland, Quitman, Hahira, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Barwick, Barretts, Dillon and Everett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
